name: Telescope Words A-Z Quiz Series - G | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
To solve these problems, you must type in one single word.  For instance, if the clue reads "Beverage - Hockey arena - Pen fluid", that would be "Drink - Rink - Ink".  ONLY TYPE THE LONGEST WORD!  In this case, that would mean you would type "Drink".  Each clue is one letter less than the previous clue (e.g. drink-d=rink, rink-r=ink).

Organ; e.g. pituitary or salivary - Nation - Also
Preserved in sugar - Decorative cloth - Perfect serve
Gluteus Maximus (abbreviation) - Old guitar-like instrument - Native American tribe
Farm animal - Grain - Location; e.g. _ the store
Weight measurement - Male sheep - Are; e.g. Sam I _
Feel with your hands - Thick cord - Archaic word for "open"
System of numbered squares on a map - Do away with - _, Ego, and Superego
Hold onto - Rough metal file - Snake
